    implicit none
    integer :: N, K, step, i_java
    character(len=200000) :: buffer
    character(len=:), allocatable :: S, T, revU, sDash, tmp
    logical :: firstTime

    ! Read input
    read(*, *) N, K
    read(*, '(a)') buffer
    S = buffer(1:N)

    firstTime = .true.
    step = 1

    do while (K > 0)
        ! Generate T as reverse of S
        T = S(len(S):1:-1)

        ! Generate revU as reverse(S // T)
        revU = (S // T)(len(S // T):1:-1)

        ! Initialize sDash to S
        sDash = S

        ! Loop over i_java from N down to 0 step step
        i_java = N
        do while (i_java >= 0)
            ! Extract substring of revU starting at i_java+1, length N
            tmp = revU(i_java + 1 : i_java + N)

            ! Compare tmp and sDash
            if (tmp < sDash) then
                sDash = tmp
            else
                if (.not. firstTime) then
                    exit
                end if
            end if

            i_java = i_java - step
        end do

        ! Check if firstTime
        if (firstTime) then
            firstTime = .false.
            if (2**K > N) then
                ! Output first character of sDash repeated N times
                write(*, '(a)') repeat(sDash(1:1), N
                stop
            end if
        else
            step = step * 2
        end if

        K = K - 1

        ! Update S to reversed sDash
        S = sDash(len(sDash):1:-1)
    end do

    ! Output reversed S
